snippet: A shootout between soldiers and gunmen took place in Qatif, an area populated by minority Shiites, who have been protesting what they call entrenched discrimination.
lead_paragraph: A shootout between soldiers and gunmen took place in Qatif, an area populated by minority Shiites, who have been protesting what they call entrenched discrimination.

headline.seo: Saudi Soldier Shot While Patrolling Restive Area
headline.main: Saudi Soldier Is Killed in a Shootout
